title: Season 3, Ep 12 - Stowaway (w/ Liam O'Brien of Critical Role)
description:
A bag of apples hides the halfling runaway Endwhill the Meek.


Credits

Arnie: Arnie Niekamp

Chunt: Adal Rifai

Usidore: Matt Young

Endwhill the Meek: Liam O'Brien

Mysterious Man: Tim Sniffen


Producers: Arnie Niekamp, Matt Young, and Adal Rifai

Post-Production Coordination: Garrett Schultz

Earwolf Producer: Kimmie Lucas

Editor: Sage G.C

Special Assistance: Ryan DiGiorgi

Magic Tavern Logo: Allard Laban

Theme Music: Andy Poland

Sea Shanty Theme: Arne Parrott

Fan Song: Patrick O'Rourke
